column2: "Afei mehyɛ wo wɔ Nyankopɔn nye Jesus Kraest a obobua atseasefo nye ewufo atsɛn
column3: wɔ ne mbae nye n’ahendzi no mu no enyim dɛ
column6: kɔ do ka no mber pa na mber bɔn mu; yi atsɛn
column9: wɔ abotar kɛse nye nkyerɛkyerɛ nyina mu."

column2: "Na ber bɛba a worinntsie nkyerɛkyerɛ pa
column3: na mbom wobedzi hɔn akɔndɔ ekyir aprapra akyerɛkyerɛfo aboa ano ma wɔakyerɛkyerɛ dza hɔnara wɔpɛ dɛ wɔtse;"

column2: "na wɔbɛdan hɔn aso efi nokwar no ho
"Na ɔwo dze
column3: gyen w’enyi wɔ adze nyina mu

column2: "Na emi dze
"Mako ɔko pa no
column6: "afei dza ɔda hɔ ma me nye tsenenee ahenkyɛw a Ewuradze tsɛmbuafo tsenenee no dze bɛma me da no
column8: na hɔn a wɔdɔ ne mbae no nyina so."

column2: "Bɔ mbɔdzen bra me nkyɛn ntsɛm:"
"na Demas adɔ sesei wiadze yi egya me hɔ esi mu kɔ Tesalonika; Kresɛns kɔ Galatia
"Luke nko na ɔnye me wɔ ha. Fa Mark ka woho bra: na oye ma me wɔ ɔsom mu."
"Tikikus dze
"Sɛ ereba a
column3: fa m’egudotar a medanee gyaa Troas wɔ Karpus nkyɛn no bra
column5: nkanka nwoma a wɔkyerɛw do no."

column2: "Alɛksanda kɔɔberdwimfo no yɛɛ me bɔn pii: Ewuradze botua no kaw dɛ mbrɛ no ndwuma tse:"
"ɔno na wo so hwɛ yie wɔ no ho
column3: na osiiw hɛn asɛm kwan pii."

column2: "M’anoyi a odzi kan no mu no
column4: na hɔn nyina daan me gyae: meserɛ dɛ mma wommbu nngu hɔn do."

column2: "Naaso Ewuradze gyinaa m’ekyir
column4: na wɔnam mo do eewie asɛnka no
column5: na amanamamfo nyina aatse: na wɔgyee me fii gyata anomu."

column2: "Ewuradze bɛgye me efi ndwuma bɔn nyina mu
column3: na ɔaagye me akɔ no sor ahendzi no mu: ɔno na enyimnyam nka no mbersantsen mfesantsen. Amen."

column2: "Kyia Priska nye Akwila
"Erastus tsenaa Korinte: na Trofimus yar ma madan no egya Miletus."
"Bɔ mbɔdzen bra ansaana awɔwber edu
column6: nye enuanom no nyina kyia wo."

column2: "Ewuradze nye wo sunsum ntsena. Adom nka wo."
